name: Glassy Tale
description: Glassy Tale is a visual novel with 9 different possible endings. You will be taken in a story  between the forces of the wills, emotions and luck of the characters.  My first visual novel, a project made entirely by me. If you wish, you can donate to my bitcoin wallet, it will be much appreciated, and will help me on my next projects:  1LVsJDEeK8XHALEc3u5VpmCog7KEjkFA3o
